review: I have a Roku 3 on the tv in the family room and liked it so much I wanted to get another device for the living room and bedroom. After reading reviews I decided on the stick since it is easier to move around and it doesn't have to have somewhere to sit. Since I cut the cable cord I signed up for Netflix and Hulu Plus while also being an Amazon Prime member and having the Roku makes it easy. I like that the remote has some of those buttons on it making navigation easier.  The only thing that I didn't like was how hot the stick gets when it's being used.
